import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Table, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/message' import Loader from '../components/loader' import FormContainer from '../components/formContainer' import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions' function UserListScreen() { const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const {loading, error, users} = userList useEffect(() => { if(userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin) { dispatch(listUsers()) }else{ navigate('/') } }, [dispatch, ]) const deleteHandler = (id) => { console.log(`User ${id} has been removed`) } return (

Users

{loading ? () : error ? ({error}) : ( {users.map(user => ( ))}
ID NAME EMAIL ADMIN
{user._id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.isAdmin ? ( ) : ( )}
)}
) } export default UserListScreen
